sense.gloss: to step on, to tread on, to trample on
to set foot on (e.g. foreign soil), to stand on, to visit
to experience, to undergo
to follow (rules, principles, etc.), to go through (e.g. formalities), to complete
to estimate, to guess, to judge, to value, to appraise
to rhyme
to succeed to (e.g. the throne)
dance (esp. Western style), dancing
rear step out
following (a precedent, former policy, etc.), continuing with, sticking to, observing
to step forward, to step forth, to advance
to start, to embark on, to set forth on, to take steps toward
railway crossing, railroad crossing, train crossing, level crossing
starting line, scratch
determination
stepping over the edge of the ring
to take off, to jump, to leap
to take the plunge, to decide, to embark on, to venture into, to launch out into
to step out of the ring
to be based on, to take into account, to build upon, to have origin in
to have one's feet firmly planted on, to plant oneself on
to step into (e.g. someone else's territory), to break into, to raid
to come to grips with, to get to the core of
stepping (in place), stamping (up and down), stomping, marking time (for a soldier)
standstill, stalemate

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑危険↑↓きけん↓な↑領域↑↓りょういき↓に↑踏↑↓ふ↓み↑込↑↓こ↓んでいるよ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑会↑↓あ↓い↑損↑↓そこ↓ねて↑地団駄↑↓じだんだ↓を↑踏↑↓ふ↓んだよ。
sdata.e: I was chagrined at missing you.

sdata.j: ↑極小↑↓きょくしょう↓の↑虫↑↓むし↓でも↑踏↑↓ふ↓まれれば、そりくり↑返↑↓かえ↓る。
sdata.e: Even the smallest worm will turn if trodden on.

sdata.j: ↑机↑↓つくえ↓の↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑舞踏↑↓ぶとう↓についての↑本↑↓ほん↓がある。
sdata.e: There is a book on dancing on the desk.

sdata.j: ↑割↑↓わ↓れたガラスを↑踏↑↓ふ↓むな。
sdata.e: Don't step on the broken glass.

sdata.j: ↑階段↑↓かいだん↓を↑踏↑↓ふ↓みはずして↑足首↑↓あしくび↓を↑捻挫↑↓ねんざ↓したようです。
sdata.e: I missed a step on the stairs and I'm afraid I sprained my ankle.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓をするにも↑順序↑↓じゅんじょ↓を↑踏↑↓ふ↓んでやりなさい。
sdata.e: No matter what you do, you must follow the correct order.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓には↑降↑↓ふ↓られるわ、デートに↑遅刻↑↓ちこく↓するわ、↑財布↑↓さいふ↓を↑落↑↓お↓とすわ、↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑踏↑↓ふ↓んだり↑蹴↑↓け↓ったりだよ。
sdata.e: I get caught in the rain, I'm late for my date, and I lose my pocketbook. It's just one thing after another today.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑歩↑↓ほ↓↑踏↑↓ふ↓み↑出↑↓だ↓せば↑半分↑↓はんぶん↓↑終↑↓お↓わったも↑同↑↓おな↓じ。
sdata.e: The first step is as good as half over.

words.gloss: to step on, to tread on, to trample on
